name: The Somboyz Demo
description:
The Somboyz is a 2D Shooter-Platformer, your mission is recue ""Blue" and Kill "The Doctor" and his Zombies Army but how easy it is?

The demo includes the first boss and a lot of ACTION!!!

What are you waiting to download for FREE the Demo

Coming soon available for Xbox One, Android and PC

CONTROLS:

Move ---> A,W,S,D or Arrows

Jump ---> Spacebar

Shot ---->Z

Action--->X

(This is not the final version of the game)
